content:
<table-wrap id="tbl1" position="float">
<label>1</label>
<caption>
<title>
<sup>27</sup>Al MQMAS Analysis</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup cols="5">
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col4"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col5"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:thead>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center"></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center" nameend="col3" namest="col2" rowsep="1">dehydrated</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center" nameend="col5" namest="col4" rowsep="1">hydrated</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center"></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">
<italic>C</italic>
<sub>Q</sub> (MHz)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">δ<sub>iso</sub> (ppm)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">
<italic>C</italic>
<sub>Q</sub> (MHz)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">δ<sub>iso</sub> (ppm)</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Al<sup>V</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>5.3</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>35.5</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Al(OH)<sub>3</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.7</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>12.1</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.2</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>12.8</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Al<sup>VI</sup>
<sub>1</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.5</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1.3</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3.9</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>

<table-wrap id="tbl2" position="float">
<label>2</label>
<caption>
<title>
<sup>27</sup>Al Parameters of the
1D MAS Spectra Recorded at Magnetic Fields of 9.4 and 17.6 T Including
the Czjzek Model</title>
</caption>
<oasis:table colsep="0" rowsep="0">
<oasis:tgroup cols="7">
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col1"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col2"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col3"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col4"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col5"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="char" char="." colname="col6"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:colspec align="left" colname="col7"></oasis:colspec>
<oasis:thead>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center"></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center" nameend="col4" namest="col2" rowsep="1">dehydrated</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center" nameend="col7" namest="col5" rowsep="1">hydrated</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry align="center"></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">
<italic>C</italic>
<sub>Q</sub> (MHz)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">δ<sub>iso</sub> (ppm)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">FWHMCS (ppm)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">
<italic>C</italic>
<sub>Q</sub> (MHz)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">δ<sub>iso</sub> (ppm)</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry align="center">FWHMCS (ppm)</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:thead>
<oasis:tbody>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Al<sup>V</sup>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>5.3</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>35.5</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Al(OH)<sub>3</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.7</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>12.1</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.2</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>12.8</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry></oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Al<sup>VI</sup>
<sub>1</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.8</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>2.8</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>8</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>1.5</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3.5</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>5</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
<oasis:row>
<oasis:entry>Al<sup>VI</sup>
<sub>2</sub>
</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3.9</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>–5.2</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>20</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>3</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>–3.8</oasis:entry>
<oasis:entry>10</oasis:entry>
</oasis:row>
</oasis:tbody>
</oasis:tgroup>
</oasis:table>
</table-wrap>
clean_text:
Table 2. 27Al Parameters of the 1D MAS Spectra Recorded at Magnetic Fields of 9.4 and 17.6 T Including the Czjzek Model

|              | dehydrated C<sub>Q</sub> (MHz) | dehydrated δ<sub>iso</sub> (ppm) | dehydrated FWHMCS (ppm) | hydrated C<sub>Q</sub> (MHz) | hydrated δ<sub>iso</sub> (ppm) | hydrated FWHMCS (ppm) |
|--------------|-------------------------------|---------------------------------|-------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------------------------|-----------------------|
| Al<sup>V</sup> | 5.3                           | 35.5                            |                         |                               |                                 |                       |
| Al(OH)<sub>3</sub> | 2.7                       | 12.1                            |                         | 2.2                           | 12.8                            |                       |
| Al<sup>VI</sup><sub>1</sub> | 2.8               | 2.8                             | 8                       | 1.5                           | 3.5                             | 5                     |
| Al<sup>VI</sup><sub>2</sub> | 3.9               | –5.2                            | 20                      | 3                             | –3.8                            | 10                    |

content:
<italic>T</italic> <sub>IS</sub> and <italic>T</italic> <sub arrange="stack">1ρ</sub> <sup arrange="stack">I</sup> Values for Dehydrated and Hydrated MIL-100­(Al) dehydrated hydrated T IS (ms) T 1ρ I (ms) T IS (ms) T 1ρ I (ms) AlV 3.1 10.5 Al(OH)3 0.2 2.2 0.2 2 AlVI 1 1 7.5 0.7 6

Approximate value as experiments were run only until a contact time of 6 ms.
clean_text:
Table 3. T<sub>IS</sub> and T<sub>1ρI</sub> Values for Dehydrated and Hydrated MIL-100­(Al)

|          | dehydrated |         | hydrated |         |
|----------|------------|---------|----------|---------|
|          | T<sub>IS</sub> (ms) | T<sub>1ρI</sub> (ms) | T<sub>IS</sub> (ms) | T<sub>1ρI</sub> (ms) |
| Al<sup>V</sup> | 3.1 | 10.5[^a] |          |         |
| Al(OH)<sub>3</sub> | 0.2 | 2.2 | 0.2 | 2 |
| Al<sup>VI</sup><sub>1</sub> | 1 | 7.5 | 0.7 | 6 |

[^a]: Approximate value as experiments were run only until a contact time of 6 ms.

etc.condition: Approximate value as experiments were run only until a contact time of 6 ms
